Personal Website

Using CSS3, HTML5 to build a simple personal website. The blog is powered by Jekyll. The website is hosted on Github.

Data Visualization

I have developed some data visualization samples using D3.js.

Web Crawler

A web crawler that captures all the menswear on ssense.com. Captured product's name, designer and price. Developed using Scrapy, witten in Python

Future plan: visualize the data, e.g. compare the price among different brands
